Entries.default: The crush of time has significantly weakened this section of wall. You feel a slight breeze coming through the cracks between the stone. You suspect that the wall will come right down with a little bit of force.
[Specified 0] gets a running start and slams into the wall, busting it to pieces.
[Specified 0] charges into the wall, but it doesn't budge. [Specified 0] stumbles back, grimacing in pain.
[Blast the wall with a concussion bomb.]
You start to put leverage on the prybar and the wall begins to tremble. If you continue, there will be no way to get out of the way without collapsing the wall on yourself.
You step back from the wall.
You manage to pull the wall down... but it collapses right on top of you.
